label: 忠節
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Service that required compensation. Only autonomous tozama warriors, could submit petitions for reward (gunchūjō) and demand compensation. This term carries no connotation of loyalty, and did not describe miuchi service for their lord. [外様、軍忠状、身内]
